duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic to intermediate-level remittance processing tasks under close supervision.
Operates Mail Extraction Equipment to group work into processible batches.
Perform daily reconciliation and billing reports.
Prepare outgoing packages for low/medium complexity remittance customers.
Maintain performance output in accordance with entry-level department standards.
Perform minor adjustments and minor repairs to job-related equipment.
Maintain performance output in accordance with client standards.
